enum urltype_e

Supported URL types.

Enumerator:
URL_IS_UNKNOWN 

unknown (aka a file)

URL_IS_DASH 

stdin/stdout

URL_IS_PATH 

file://...

URL_IS_FTP 

ftp://...

URL_IS_HTTP 

http://...

URL_IS_HTTPS 

https://...

URL_IS_HKP 

hkp://...
